Name: Idle Banshee Alliance
About the game: Game features: 1. Team up system, 5 banshees can be selected to fight at the same time. As each banshee has different skills, your team members are very important. 2. Rich skill system, with more than 100 skills in the game. Each banshee can learn other skills besides her own. So you can match the ever-changing skill combination according to your preference. 3. Map exploration. With the improvement of lock level, you can unlock higher level maps to obtain better banshees. 4. Divine beast system. Divine beast is not limited by carrying level, but it is not easy to obtain. You need to challenge a difficult task to get it. 5. Exchange system. Unwanted skill books can be exchanged for advanced skill books in the store. 6. The banshee attribute system has five attributes, including strength, magic, physique, endurance and speed. These attributes are very important for strength improvement. 7. Qualification system. The qualification of the banshee also determines her growth. The higher the qualification is, the higher the attribute will be obtained after upgrading.
